name: Z-Let it Snowy
effect: Wind Based. This move cause Frostbite. Roll Flinch 3 chance dices against the foe. If performed under Hail Weather or Snow Weather, Ignore this move's Reduced Accuracy and gain Never Fail. If performed under Sunny Weather Accuracy becomes -3 instead. -2 Accuracy. Special rises by 2.
description: This blizzard may not last long, but it turns the land into a snowy wonderland. Let it freeze, let it be cold... we will build a snowman!
